title: ZK I Zettel 5,52a4a - Niklas Luhmann-Archiv
body: 5,52a4a f체r Stichproben. Handlungs-/T채tigkeitskontrolle S. 28: "The third, and perhaps simplest, method of reviewis to watch the employee at work, either tosee that he puts in the required number of hours,or to see that he is engaging in certain movementswhich if continued will result in the completion ofthe work. In this case, the review extends to processesand techniques, rather than to the product or results.It is the prevalent form of review at the foremanshiplevel." Diese Unterscheidung stimmt fast genau 체berein mitmeiner in Leistungs-, Erfolgs-, und Handlungskontrolle(interessant auch, dass die gleiche Reihenfolge gew채hltist).
